Author: affenb3rt
Content:
The general way of handling your case would be:

Adapt the mod to recognize if any of its data shall be saved or not (skipping its own OnStoreSave logic)

Start the server with the mod already installed and make it aware that it shall not safe anything.

Let the server run for a few minutes so that every item is saved eventually (but without your stuff).

Shutdown the server.

Remove the mod.

Author: affenb3rt
Content: But beware!! This only works for items that are in the world (bases etc) and players who are online. Players who are offline and items those players have in their inventory will be corrupted still because those are not loaded and saved
